params._fee: uint256 of the fee value, multiply your % value by 10, Example: if you want fee of 0.5% , insert 5;
params._marketIndex: uint256 of the market index which to the vaults are associated to;

params._oracle: address representing the smart contract to lookup the price of the given _token param;
params._strikePrice: uint256 representing the price to trigger the depeg event, needs to be the same decimals as the oracle price;
params._token: address of the oracle to lookup the price in chainlink oracles;
params._withdrawalFee: uint256 of the fee value, multiply your % value by 10, Example: if you want fee of 0.5% , insert 5;
params.epochBegin: uint256 in UNIX timestamp, representing the begin date of the epoch. Example: Epoch begins in 31/May/2022 at 00h 00min 00sec: 1654038000;
params.epochEnd: uint256 in UNIX timestamp, representing the end date of the epoch. Example: Epoch ends in 30th June 2022 at 00h 00min 00sec: 1656630000;

returns.insr: address of the deployed hedge vault;
returns.rsk: address of the deployed risk vault;

params.epochBegin: uint256 in UNIX timestamp, representing the begin date of the epoch. Example: Epoch begins in 31/May/2022 at 00h 00min 00sec: 1654038000;
params.epochEnd: uint256 in UNIX timestamp, representing the end date of the epoch and also the ID for the minting functions. Example: Epoch ends in 30th June 2022 at 00h 00min 00sec: 1656630000;
params.index: uint256 of the market index to create more assets in;
uint256 of the market index which to the vaults are associated to;

returns.vaults: address array of two vaults addresses, [0] being the hedge vault, [1] being the risk vault;

params._controller: address of the controller smart contract;

changeWithdrawalVaultFee(uint256,uint256.notice: admin function to change fees on running vaults;

createNewMarket(uint256,address,int256,u.notice: function to create two new vaults, hedge and risk, with the respective params, and storing the oracle for the token provided

deployMoreAssets(uint256,uint256,uint256.notice: function to deploy hedge assets for given epochs, after the creation of this vault, where the Index is the date of the end of epoch;

getVaults(uint256).notice: function the retrieve the addresses of the hedge and risk vaults, in an array, in the respective order;

setController(address).notice: function to set the controller address;
